experiment_info.name: bobyqa_polish
experiment_info.description: Use COBYLA/BOBYQA-style bound-constrained optimizer for polish instead of NM
experiment_info.hypothesis: BOBYQA's quadratic approximation may converge faster than NM's simplex for smooth RMSE landscapes in 3-6 dimensions

tuning_runs.notes: COBYLA is both SLOWER and WORSE than NM baseline
trust-constr is MUCH SLOWER due to Hessian approximation overhead

result: FAILED - Both COBYLA and trust-constr are worse than Nelder-Mead. No alternative polish method beats NM.
